Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Shockingly bad. No Atmos on Amazon Prime
Review_Text: I bought this brand new 2020 stick to use with a 1080p HD TV as advertised. Netflix has programmes going out in Dolby Atmos, hooray! There is absolutely no Dolby Atmos on the Amazon Prime app on this stick. I cannot connect to Disney. BBC iPlayer does not work. This stick should not have been released until the bugs were ironed out. I'm returning this junk.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Wish I would have got one ages ago
Review_Text: As a family with young kids this is complete game changer.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: VERY ANNOYING
Review_Text: Don't know what Amazon are playing at but this isn't the proper UK version and will not accept BBC iplayer download. It's some US warehouse surplus palmed off onto unsuspecting Brits. There is some small print explaining it's a problem they're working on but nobody would notice as it's at the bottom of the page. Damn deceitful if you ask me and customers should be compensated

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: This ISN'T 4K!!! Don't buy to upgrade your 4k stick with Dolby Atmos
Review_Text: BBC iPlayer and ITV Hub now working fine.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Never again
Review_Text: I bought the Firestick because my Panasonic TV will not deliver ITV Hub, More 4 or My 5. The Firestick promises all. More 4 and My 5 are there..but after two hours of phone calls to the Philippines and being directed over an appalling phone line to download 'Firelinked' and then 'Downloader', plus tapping in codes from goodness knows where, I managed to download ITV Hub. But while the other services connect well with my iMac, ITV Hub doesn't want to know. The lady in the Philippines kept telling me it was an ITV Hub software problem, but it works perfectly well on the computer...just not via the Firestick. I want to send it back...but having typed in multiple times our various email addresses and passwords, I feel really unsure about doing so. I cannot get help from Amazon nor from ITV. And after four hours of trying, I give up...it's a complete waste of time and money. I'll write it off and put it in the bin.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Features and apps missing
Review_Text: Let me begin by saying I already had a firestick installed. It did everything I needed it to do, but it was running a little slow. Even after a clean reset, it wasn't running at its best.  So I bought the latest and greatest firestick. Released today (30/09/20).

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Another 2020 disappointment
Review_Text: Very disappointed. Released today so thought it would be the most up to date fire stick. Can't download ITV Hub or BBC iPlayer apps.  Lots to watch but chargeable despite having Prime. Will be returning for a refund and will try 2019 version. Yet another year 2020 disappointment

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Read before buy, pros and cons
Review_Text: Was waiting for new model, will share my findings hope it will help to decide is it right one for you or not.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Alexa, entertain me!
Review_Text: I own quite a few amazon devices, including echo, echo show and the fire phone, but the one that I've always wanted and never got around to buying, was a Fire-stick. Although my tv is a smart tv, I wanted something that would put all my entertainment into one convenient location. I also own a projector, and I have recently been struggling with my laptop or xbox in order to watch movies. The Fire-stick would offer a more portable way of getting everything I wanted to stream through my projector. The stick arrived this morning, in a small recyclable box, and inside I found the stick, an Alexa voice remote, two AAA amazon batteries, a plug, a micro usb cable and a HDMI extension cable for improved WI-FI connectivity. My first impression of the device was how great it looks. It has a matt black finish with the familiar glossy Amazon smile. Everything about this product is top quality. I removed the packaging and read the simple, easy to follow instructions, and within minutes I was up and running. I plugged it in and connected it to the HDMI port on my TV and setup was seamless. It did a quick update and then I was ready to go. I was able to install all of the TV apps that I needed, including Netflix, Prime, Disney+ and for the first time, Apple TV +. I haven't yet been able to watch Apple TV+ on a TV as I didn't have anything compatible with the app, and the website required a credit card, which I don't have. This was an added bonus that I wasn't expecting from the fire stick. Alongside the well known entertainment apps, there are also many more than can be installed. Alongside movie apps, you can get music, games and even the weather. The quality of the visuals is stunning, and although this isn't the 4K version, it upscales everything on my 4K TV to HDR10 which is almost the same quality as 4K. To the untrained eye, it has stunning image quality. The addition of dolby atmos support on this model is also great, as it gives me the option to be able to watch movies with the best possible audio quality. The user interface is simple and clean, and a pleasure to navigate, and the remote control works seamlessly. The Alexa voice control function can be used across the device and enabled on many apps so that you need never push a button. The Fire-stick is small and stays out of sight, and only one cable from the back of the TV shows its presence. I honestly can't say anything bad about this device, and the new updated 3rd generation processors means it is fast, and doesn't keep me waiting around. I can simply load up a film or a tv show whenever I wish. It will also be perfect for my projector and it will make watching movies on the big screen more of a pleasure than a chore. If you have been looking to get a Fire-stick, but are on the fence, I urge you to get down from it and buy one. You won't regret it. 5*

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Fantastic audio and pictures with a reasonable TV and amp. Make sure TV is close to a power socket.
Review_Text: Have never had a streaming stick before and in my own opinion despite others saying differently I found the sound better than anything I have had so far. It shows on screen that it’s sound is being output in HDR and the quality is superb. I have a reasonable home audio system and I am sure many Amazon clients will have better and more expensive systems than I. I was surprised it is a plug in to HDMI as in my ignorance thought it would be USB. Only downside I can see is that as others had mentioned the power lead must be near an electrical power socket. My LG OLED is on a wall bracket that has an arm that means easy to access back for connections plus I have a double power socket half way up my wall by the TV. Plugged into HDMI 3 as my Sky Q  box is on HDMI 2 (Arc) through my Sony Amp. Put amp on TV setting and I was blown away by the sound both for Apple TV and audio apps. I know you can now get a Sky Q box swap over for £50 to HDR and now more ready than ever to do that after hearing this HDR audio.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: TV Controls Don't Work
Review_Text: Returning this item as the TV controls don't work with my Sharp TV. I've had 3 calls with the Amazon customer care team and frankly they've been useless. They have all tried different things, don't understand the issue, give me things to try that are impossible to carry out (e.g. try using the volume apps on the mobile phone app - there aren't any volume controls on the mobile phone app). They have offered to send me a replacement to try, but I don't believe this will work as I think it's software problem rather than a hardware problem - but no-one on the customer care team understands this (it isn't in their standard script).

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: A Winner
Review_Text: For me the major benefit of this much superior Amazon HD Fire TV stick is the addition of a disable HDR option. At last I can switch off this annoying process which degrades rather than improves picture quality. Hopefully Amazon will incorporate an HDR off switch in any revised 4K Fire TV stick or even better as an upgrade on software if possible for current 4K units? Picture

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Extreme and excessive WIFI Data usage
Review_Text: Upon using the firestick for the first time and having a limited wireless data package i was alarmed at the amount of data the Firestick used in a 3 day period

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: No BBC iPlayer - step backwards. Now resolved
Review_Text: Spent ages trying to add BBC iPlayer only to find out it's not available.  Very disappointed, the reason I purchased the firestick was to catch up on iPlayer on bedroom TV. It is available on older versions, I didn't think purchasing the latest version would be a step backwards.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: No I player. Don't waste your money
Review_Text: I wanted to update my firestick and this one is lacking in the fact no I player. I called customer services the day it arrived 30/09/2020. And they said it would be resolved in 72 hours well its 6 days later and still no I player. Very disappointed indeed. An inferior product. Don't waste your money

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Amazon Fire stick read before you buying warning
Review_Text: If thinking of upgrading to the 3rd your Amazon Fire stick do not as it night mare set up and flickering issues and is missing ITV HUB. I have reverted back 2nd until Amazon resolved the issues I am return for refund.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Doing 70, going much faster (much!)
Review_Text: I already own a TV Fire stick (and according to my purchase history), I bought it in Dec 2019, but it also seems that a lot has happened since then.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Perfect for what I need
Review_Text: I have a non smart 50" Samsung TV, and needed a way to watch Amazon Prime, Netflix, YouTube etc. Seeing as I have an Amazon account, and use Echo Dot's I thought it made sense to go down the Fire TV route. I'm really pleased I did.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: SIMPLE to set up/use...works GREAT...so MANY different channels to choose from...?
Review_Text: BROUGHT AMAZON FIRE TV STICK(3rd generation): £39.99

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Excellent package
Review_Text: Update: BBC iPlayer

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Great product and much improved over previous versions although the remote is a 'b' to fit batteries
Review_Text: This is the second one of these I have bought and am much impressed with performance over previous versions. It does all I require instead of buying a smart TV at a sensible price compared to others on the market. The only difficulty I have had is opening the remote to install batteries which is a 'B', there is a video on YouTube about this but even so I had to insert a screwdriver into the joiny poistion and lever the thing open, scratching the cover in the process. I can imagine others may cause more damage than I did and even possible self injury - needs careful handling and a design review IMO.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Firestick has opened up a whole new world!!
Review_Text: Having suffered an old restrictive Freeview / recorder box for years which had no On Demand services at all, I decided to give the Firestick a go.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Easy to set up
Review_Text: Should have bought one earlier but thought it would be difficult to get up (in the older generation bracket) but it was easy to set up and opened up a multitude of new programmes across all ages. We are currently enjoying the  Jack Ryan episodes, films and more sport! Have used Alexa voice controls a couple of times, but over time feel confident we can get more out of this well priced equipment which has so much to offer.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Fast interface with a good remote
Review_Text: This new 2020 fire stick is super fast and has all the tv apps you need

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Does exactly what you'd expect, BUT....
Review_Text: ...This is the third one I've bought in eighteen months, as they just stop working after a year. I have fire sticks on two TVs in the house, and now this new one is the only one that's working out of the four I've bought. And they've all failed at just over a year old, so the guarantee was up every time and I couldn't get any help or a repair through Amazon. If anyone knows how I can get the three non-working fire sticks to work I'd be grateful!

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Great
Review_Text: 5/11/2020 - Wish I had bought one sooner.  Arrived quickly and was very easy to set up.  I think my favourite thing so far is being able to see my photos on the big screen.  The remote is easy to use and I have even been pressing the microphone and getting Alexa to find things for me.  I will update this review in about six weeks, by which time I will be more used to it and will most likely have more to say.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Great
Review_Text: When BBC stopped Playstation 3 support for Iplayer at the end of October it spurred me into buying the Amazon Fire, something I had been meaning to do since ITV did the same thing a year or more ago.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Just what we need for the bedroom
Review_Text: We have a firestick (about two years old) for the lounge TV, which has always worked very well, and decided to get this new stick for the bedroom TV. Has all the apps we need - Netflix, Prime video, Prime music, Disney, Apple TV, BritBox, BBC iPlayer, ITV hub, All 4, My5, UKTV Play.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Brilliant!  Why didn't I get one sooner?
Review_Text: I'm desperately trying to find a solution to the problem of getting rid of Sky and the convenience it brings, as well as sidestepping the increasingly clunky apps on my Smart TV.  I've looked at several HTPC options, but I couldn't find anything that would bring together the various streaming services in any sensible (or even functional) way without needing hacks.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Bad lip syncing issue despite clearing cache/data etc. Very poor image quality with BT Sport app
Review_Text: Significant audio delay causing lip syncing issues. Tried suggested online fixes like resetting to factory defaults/clearing cache etc but problem remained.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Great..if you have excellent internet and a lot of patience.
Review_Text: Seems great so far. The only reason I took off 1 star is I don't know why the layout is so different compared to the app for prime video. Your watchlist is called something else- your videos, theb from there you have to scroll through. With a letter by letter clicking system, this can get very tedious. I'm really confused why Amazon chose to do this.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Wouldn't buy another or recommend it.
Review_Text: I bought the Fire TV Stick to get internet based catch up programmes on our TV, since it's not a Smart TV.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Disappointed
Review_Text: I bought this for the Dolby Atmos upgrade but it doesn’t work. See photos.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Faster than the previous version, TV volume control is great!
Review_Text: Our fire remote broke so I went to buy a new one, and found that i could get the newest and shiniest Fire TV and the TV/CEC controller for not much more than just buying a remote control.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Amazing little device
Review_Text: What can I say this gem device is a remarkable gadget.First point comes with a a extension lead so if you are tight for space then this solves technical issue .

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Disappointed
Review_Text: This is the first time I’ve tried using a fire tv stick I bought this for my bedroom tv it’s not a smart tv but it has 2 hdmi

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: I love firesticks
Review_Text: I love firesticks, I have 3 in my home now an o have got this one for my sons room! they easy and quick to set up. They have pretty much every tv app you can think of on them too! Highly recommended

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Bought to replace an aging Now TV box.
Review_Text: I was expecting great things from something so small but I should have known that when it didn't work with my primary TV that things weren't going to go smoothly.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Wish we had bought one before!
Review_Text: We bought a fire stick as a Christmas gift for son in law, he requested one. As they were on offer we decided to get one for ourselves to see what all the fuss was about!  At first couldn’t get it working on our  old Plazma HD TV as sound is on a separate unit, so we connected it to our bedroom Tv which was very easy to install and was great! So we thought of another way we could connect to our main TV, the old Plazma, we got another fire stick and a Bluetooth gadget and hay presto that sent the sound to our speaker receiver and we are all up and running!  So pleased with the quality of the pictures and only wished we had purchased these before! Highly recommend.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: I dare anybody not to lose this tiny remote control!
Review_Text: I only purchased this so I could watch Spitting Image on Britbox on the TV instead of the laptop; I only signed up to Britbox to watch Spitting Image.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Faster and smarter but TV control doesn't work
Review_Text: This new version is much faster to load than my old one. I like the layouts too; easier to find your favourites or search for new stuff. Overall the appearance is much easier on the eye.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Amazon still failing to address software update issues
Review_Text: I had a 2nd generation Firestick that I am giving to my family. Already have a 4K Firestick that I purchased earlier this year for my 4K TV. Just bought a 3rd generation Firestick to replace my old 2nd gen model. Set it up on my old HD TV to make it “smart” again, yesterday. It updated with so called latest software. Sadly, like my 4K stick it still does not have latest software as detailed on Amazon website. I receive the standard “checking/ downloading software” message. Generally gets stuck on downloading. Sometimes it says installs but when I check version with Settings etc no change at all. I have tried all the generic advice from Amazon and it is useless. On my HD TV - I use Amazon Ethernet adaptor getting 50-70Mb download from my fibre connection. On my 4K I get 100Mb download on WiFi as about 20 cm from my router. Yes both Firesticks work but have zero confidence in them receiving latest update hence 3 stars. I note online that multiple people have same update issues but Amazon give out same generic information!

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Do not buy for plex livetv dvr(Dizque tv)
Review_Text: Wanted to replace 4k version as my 4k version on plex livetv dvr (dizque tv) kept pausing after a few minutes. I have the old square 4k one and a old hd version that play plex live tv pefectly. So decided to opt for this new one as other reviews mentioned how fast streaming was.  Unfotunately this version on plex live tv dvr buffers more then shuts down to the tv guide after a few minutes. So i feel basically ive wasted 40 pounds.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: A very pleasant to use alternative remote control, and great value for time and money.
Review_Text: Our Humax remote control had been very unresponsive for ages, possibly since new. I'd youtubed, opened it up and cleaned the swich rubber and contacts. Slight improvements. Repeated clean - no change. Searched for relacement and up popped the FireTV stick. The reviews were positive and the price was cheaper than a Humax replacement, and not much more than an unbranded replacement.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: I’ve had two of the same one so definitely a flaw with it.
Review_Text: When you turn the tv off, the fire stick won’t turn back on unless you flip the main switch multiple times. Both of mine did this. I have an older model 4K one that works with my tv and I’ve never had that issue with it. Also what’s up with the new software? I can’t get it on my 4K one, thankfully because it sucks and I can’t change it back. The layout is dreadful and not user friendly.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Easy way to update an older Smart TV
Review_Text: I have an old, but high specification, Samsung TV which now doesn't recognise modern apps such as BBC iPlayer, ITV hub etc.  It's also slow in dealing with YouTube and All4.  I was forced to watch iPlayer using my tablet and Apple TV device to 'mirror' the programmes.  Cumbersome and prone to buffering problems.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Its ok
Review_Text: Great product, excellent elexa voice control the best part of the product unless without a subscription to Netflix as everything is charged it states watch with Netflix or rent or by the film so disappointed films are not included with prime but as advertised it does have some films included in prime but expected for the price it would have all the films on it included so only any good for youtube and Netflix another setback is before you can download any apps you need to spend a lot a time setting up bank details and addresses before you can download anything medium technical background needed.

Product_Title: All-new Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (includes TV controls) | HD streaming device | 2020 release
Review_Header: Works really well
Review_Text: Purchased to replace an old version Firestick that had worn out😁. We had connection and playback problems, so needed a new device. We have a small tv in the kitchen diner, and use a Firestick instead of needing to set up a full aerial cable.
